tpk::PointingObs

tpk::PointingObs Class Reference

#include <PointingObs.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Pointing observation.

The Pointing Observation class is a base class for classes that log pointing observations.

Public Member Functions

Member Function Documentation

void tpk::PointingObs::mark (  ) 

Mark pointing observation.

Captures all the data needed for logging a pointing observation in member variables.
